GSP30abhmal1u:1083: mayā proccārite śabde tvaṃ vaktā kiṃ na jāyase
GSP30abhmal1u:1085: karaṇasya sthitir nāsti tulye vāgindriye sati
GSP30abhmal1u:1088: prayatnāc cet prayatno 'pi yady utpattis tataḥ katham // 1.528 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1089: viśeṣo jāyate hy anyo na hy anyaguṇasaṃbhavaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1092: grahaṇaṃ ca kim ucyeta svīkāro yadi saṃmataḥ // 1.530 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1093: asvasya svasya karaṇaṃ svīkāra iti bhaṇyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1094: svaśabdaś cātmavācī cet tatrātmā prakṛtir yadi // 1.531 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1095: tan nāsty aprākṛtaṃ kiṃcid ity asvatatvaṃ kathaṃ kila
GSP30abhmal1u:1096: ahaṅkāro 'py athātmā syān nāhaṃkārī kṛtir ghaṭe // 1.532 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1098: ahaṃkārasya saṃbandhi sarvam eva hi tat svakam // 1.533 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1099: ātmano vyāpakasyāsti na svaṃ nāsvaṃ ca kiṃcana
GSP30abhmal1u:1101: deśād deśāntaraprāptyā gamanaṃ ca yad ucyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1103: svīkāro dūṣitaś caiṣa svīkārāṃśo 'pi yo gatau
GSP30abhmal1u:1105: indriyāṇāṃ hi sāṃkāryam evaṃ kāryeṣu jāyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1108: gataṃ na gamyate tāvad agataṃ naiva gamyate // 1.538 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1111: utsargaḥ kila sāṃkāryaṃ tena syād iyatī sthitiḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1112: upastham indriyaṃ yac ca tasya kāryaṃ nigadyate // 1.540 // .............................
GSP30abhmal1u:1114: tadbhedavādināṃ tāvad dve māne naiva saṃgate // 1.604 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1121: vikāso yaḥ seyaṃ jagati vividhā kalpanakalā // 1.606 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1126: tathā hi devadevāṃśas tat samunmīlanaṃ dṛśaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1128: ityādi sarvaṃ yad bhāti tat pratyakṣam iti sphuṭam
GSP30abhmal1u:1130: nanv asāv asti pāścātye vaikalpikapathe tataḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1131: yato dehaghaṭābhāso sphuṭaḥ paścāt tu so 'sphuṭaḥ // 1.611 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1135: tatrāpi ca purā paścān na tu tādṛkprathā yadi // 1.613 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1142: yadi vā kathitanyāyabalāt kvāpi na citratā // 1.616 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1146: paśyan paśyati yaḥ so 'yaṃ samādhau pariniṣṭhitaḥ // 1.618 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1147: prāk tv eṣa janmakoṭīṣu tattattāpādy abhuṅkta vai
GSP30abhmal1u:1150: prakāśa eka evāyaṃ yaś cirān na vibhidyate // 1.620 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1151: ata eva hi bhedo 'sti na kaścid yo maheśvaram
GSP30abhmal1u:1154: saṃmatā bhedakatvena bhānti cet sā vibhā tathā // 1.622 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1155: na ced vibhaiva sā tādṛk tad advaitam idaṃ sphuṭam
GSP30abhmal1u:1156: bheda ity eṣa śabdas tu kevalaṃ pratibhojjhitaḥ // 1.623 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1159: ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭaś cāyaṃ tāv anyonyavibhedinau
GSP30abhmal1u:1162: nanv evaṃ pakṣapāto 'yam advaitaṃ bhavatāṃ katham // 1.626 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1163: bhedo 'py astu sa āhatya kiṃ nāma na viṣahyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1166: tvatpakṣopagamo hy eṣa syād dvayaṃ taddhi susphuṭam // 1.628 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1167: idaṃ dvaitam idaṃ neti tad idaṃ ca dvayādvayam
GSP30abhmal1u:1168: iti yatra samaṃ bhāti tad advayam udāhṛtam // 1.629 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1169: nanv ittham astu bhedo 'pi na vayaṃ śabdakāmukāḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1170: astv asau na hi no heyam ādeyaṃ vā yathātra vaḥ // 1.630 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1174: yat tad ante paraprāpyaṃ tad astu paramārthataḥ // 1.632 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1175: atra ye na hi viśrāntās te mitāṃ saṃvidaṃ śritāḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1177: tasmāt sa eka evāsau prakāśaḥ parameśvaraḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1179: tatra tā dṛṣṭayaḥ sarvā mahānadya ivārṇave
GSP30abhmal1u:1183: jñātaṃ ca gamayen mānaṃ na cāpi ujjhati mānatām
GSP30abhmal1u:1186: bhairavecchāvaśād etad viśvaṃ bhāti tathā tathā // 1.638 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1187: vastu pradarśayan mānaṃ pravṛttiṃ vidadhat sphuṭam
GSP30abhmal1u:1189: sad apy ekāntato nedaṃ nāsac cetyādisaṃvidaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1190: bhānty eva paramārthena tad anekāntadṛk sphuṭā // 1.640 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1195: idaṃ mānaṃ meyaṃ tad idam iti saṃkhyāṃ kalayituṃ
GSP30abhmal1u:1196: svarūpaṃ vā śaktaḥ ka iva jagatīty etad api sat
GSP30abhmal1u:1198: yatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvād apara iha kaḥ kiṃ prakurutām // 1.642 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1199: ahetor bhāne syād yadi na tanudikkālaniyamas
GSP30abhmal1u:1200: tato hetor īdṛṅ niyama iti kasyaiṣa mahimā
GSP30abhmal1u:1201: svabhāvo 'yaṃ hetor atha vivṛtakaṇṭhaṃ katham asau
GSP30abhmal1u:1202: na bhāvasyaivokto yamayati pare kena hi paraḥ // 1.643 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1204: nirukto viśvātmā jagati nikhile jṛmbhata iti
GSP30abhmal1u:1205: dharādeś cānanyo bhavatu tad iyaṃ bhūtacititā
GSP30abhmal1u:1207: tad asyāyaṃ lokas tadanu paraloko 'py ayam iti
GSP30abhmal1u:1208: grahaḥ kasmād dhetoḥ spṛśati na hi taṃ kālakalanā
GSP30abhmal1u:1242: svaṃ rūpaṃ vivṛṇoty alaṃ nijabalāt tacchuddhavitsaṃbhavaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1243: kartṛtvaṃ kila kāryavargam akhilaṃ bodhe nidhāya svake
GSP30abhmal1u:1244: paśyann īśvaratāṃ vrajed aham idaṃ sarvaṃ sadety uddhuraḥ // 1.653 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1246: jñeye bhedatirodhitāṃ nijacitau yasmāt sa saṃpaśyati
GSP30abhmal1u:1254: bhavet prākkakṣyāyām api sa samakāntis tad adhunā
GSP30abhmal1u:1256: tad eṣā śāktī bhūriṣir iti svasiddhātmani parā // 1.656 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1267: nanu kiṃ kadācid ayam īśvaro nijarūpaṃ prakāśayati pūrṇacitiḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1268: kiṃ vā kadācid atha saṃvṛṇute nirhetuko hi niyamaḥ kila kaḥ // 1.660 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1275: śāntis tasyās tadanu tad ayaṃ bandhanāmnāpadiṣṭas
GSP30abhmal1u:1277: sadā kadācid adhunā tadetyādi ca saṃvidaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1279: na ca kālakalābhiḥ sa spṛśyate parameśvaraḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1280: na hi tāsāṃ svatantrāsti sthitis tatkalpanāṃ vinā // 1.664 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1281: tena svasṛṣṭe bhāvāṃśe svarūpātmany api sphuṭam
GSP30abhmal1u:1284: svātantrye pāratantrye ca nānyal lakṣaṇam ucyate // 1.666 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1285: paricchinnaprakāśo hi jaḍas tenātra yaḥ sthitaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1287: tad asya rūpagrahaṇe na prakāśaḥ prakāśate
GSP30abhmal1u:1288: tathā hi bāhyo bhāvāṃśaḥ svayaṃ naiṣa prakāśate // 1.668 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1289: jñānam arthaprakāśātma tac cānābhātam eva hi
GSP30abhmal1u:1290: tasyāpi samavāyy ātmā naiva bhāti svarūpataḥ // 1.669 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1293: nanu jātaṃ yadi jñānam arthasyāsau prakāśatā
GSP30abhmal1u:1294: śaktir dharmo yadi prāptaṃ sārvajñyaṃ viśvamaṇḍale // 1.671 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1297: tataś cāprakaṭaṃ viśvaṃ sarvadaiva bhaved idam
GSP30abhmal1u:1298: aprakāśasya bhāvasya yadi ca syād prakāśanam // 1.673 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1300: jñānotpattiś ca bhāvasya svarūpasthasya cet prathā // 1.674 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1301: aviśiṣṭe svarūpasthabhāve viśvasya sā na kim
GSP30abhmal1u:1304: paricchedaka itthaṃ cet paricchedyo bhavet tataḥ // 1.676 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1307: akālpyas tena śāstreṣu tan na kālasya gocaraḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1309: yadi kālaś ca mātāraṃ paricchindyāt tato dhruvam
GSP30abhmal1u:1311: na ca mātrantaraṃ kiṃcit saṃbhaved anavasthiteḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1313: ya eva tu paricchedyo mātā tallagna eva cet
GSP30abhmal1u:1314: sa kālo mātṛmeyatve tarhy ekasya kathaṃ tava // 1.681 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1315: bhedavāde hi bhavatāṃ niṣṭhitā matir īdṛśī
GSP30abhmal1u:1316: abhedavādināṃ nas tu naiva kāpy astu khaṇḍanā // 1.682 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1317: viśvaṃ mātṛmayaṃ yeṣāṃ mātā viśvamayas tathā
GSP30abhmal1u:1326: anyathā neśvarasyāsti rāgo dveṣo 'tha vā kvacit // 1.687 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1327: yena kvāpy eṣa niyatāṃ svāṃ śaktiṃ pātayed vibhuḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1330: malapākāt suhṛdyogād bhakter bhāvāc ca sevanāt // 1.689 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1333: sāmyāc cittasya sā śaktiḥ patatīti yad ucyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1338: asmiṃs tu pakṣe sarveṣāṃ pravādānām api sthitiḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1339: yuktā sarvaṃsahe pakṣe na kiṃcit kila duṣyati // 1.693 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1345: śivaśaktiṃ na ca tāṃ vinā bhavet
GSP30abhmal1u:1352: tasyaiva hi prasādena bhaktir utpādyate nṛṇām
GSP30abhmal1u:1364: anupraveśa ity anyair alaṃ vā yuktiḍambaraiḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1367: ekam evedṛśaṃ mānam iti kecit prapedire // 1.704 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1368: dhūmād agnir iti prāyas tasyaivaitad vijṛṃbhitam
GSP30abhmal1u:1371: sphuṭām eva matiṃ matvā pratyakṣatvaṃ prapadyate // 1.706 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1372: na cānumānam antyāṃśe saṃvid ekaiva sā yataḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1375: tāvaty āṃśe sphuṭākārā pratyakṣam iti bhāṣyatām // 1.708 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1381: yathā ca dṛḍhasaṃskārāḥ sollekhāḥ sapadi svayam // 1.711 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1385: tena pratyuktam eva syād yad āhuḥ parikalpanam // 1.713 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1387: kiṃ hi tatkalpanāvyāptivitter iti na manmahe // 1.714 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1388: āśūtpattivaśād asyā na khalv asty upalakṣaṇam
GSP30abhmal1u:1389: anumīyata evaṃ sā tad eva parikalpanam // 1.715 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1390: aho svapakṣapātāndhāḥ svam apy upagataṃ muhuḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1394: na kṣaṇāc cāparaṃ kiṃcid āśubhāvitvam ucyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1395: tat sarvam āśubhāvy eva vijñānam iti tattvataḥ // 1.718 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1398: jñātaṃ tenāpi tarhy artho janmamātreṇa bhāsyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1401: yat tat kila grahāpekṣaṃ svaprakāśam athāpi sat // 1.721 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1404: na ca kvāpy anumāneṣu vyāptyāder grahaṇaṃ bhavet
GSP30abhmal1u:1409: tad api prāksthasaṃvittisamaṃ bhinnaṃ kathaṃ tathā // 1.725 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1411: tad asan na hi saṃdhānaṃ naṣṭāyām upapadyate // 1.726 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1412: atha smaraṇam eveha saṃdhānaṃ saṃvidāṃ bhavet
GSP30abhmal1u:1413: tad apy anubhavābhāve kathaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati // 1.727 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1414: na ca jñāneṣv anubhavo yujyate saṃvidaḥ kvacit
GSP30abhmal1u:1425: svātmānam atha tatsthānaṃ vismaraty eva tat kṣaṇaṃ // 1.733 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1429: svātantryāt svaṃ vapur yāvad gūhate vivṛṇoti ca // 1.735 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1431: tac ca sphuṭatayā sarvapratyakṣam iti manyatām // 1.736 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1442: atas tathāvidhe śabde śrute yat samanantaram
GSP30abhmal1u:1445: nanv asau ghaṭa ekaḥ syād avayavyātmakas tathā // 1.743 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1446: na tu śabdārthayor aikyaṃ tat kathaṃ sāmyam īdṛśam
GSP30abhmal1u:1451: iti prasādhite pūrvaṃ kaḥ praśnasyāsya saṃbhavaḥ // 1.746 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1452: tad evam upamānādāv api mānāntare sphuṭam
GSP30abhmal1u:1455: sphuṭatām eva tāṃ tāvat saṃvetti sa tathāvidhām // 1.748 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1457: sphuṭam eva hi bhāvāṃśaṃ teṣāṃ nājñātadhīḥ kvacit // 1.749 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1460: aho nu sadalaṃkāraṃ gāyatīti jaḍo janaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1463: tad asya phalacintādi kartuṃ prastūyate manāk // 1.752 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1465: tasmād bhedakathā naiva phalaṃ prati susaṃgatā // 1.753 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1466: hānādidhīḥ phalaṃ vāstu tasyā apy atha bhāsanāt
GSP30abhmal1u:1469: hlādādikaṃ phalaṃ mukhyaṃ yat sarvatreha gīyate // 1.755 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1471: tad evam idam adhyakṣaṃ sarvataḥ pravijṛmbhate // 1.756 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1479: itthaṃ pratyakṣam evedaṃ viśvaṃ yat parameśituḥ // 1.760 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1480: tat tato 'py avibhinnasya mātṛvargasya tat tathā
GSP30abhmal1u:1484: tato na bhidyate cārthaḥ pratyakṣādvaitam īdṛśam
GSP30abhmal1u:1492: sa eva cānumānaṃ syāt tasyaitāḥ parikalpanāḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1494: vastutas tv eka evāsau pratyayaḥ pāramārthikaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1495: nanv adhyakṣaviyoge syād anumānaṃ kathaṃ yataḥ // 1.768 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1497: satyaṃ kiṃtu ya eko 'sau devaḥ sarvajñatāspadam // 1.769 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1501: ata eva hi mukhyasya mānasya sadṛśatvataḥ // 1.771 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1506: jñasvarūpatvam āpnoti tad vinā mātṛtā kutaḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1507: tasmād saṃvidi yogo 'sya sa ca nānena durlabhaḥ // 1.774 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1508: vastuto hi na kaś cit sa savinnātho hy asau tathā
GSP30abhmal1u:1510: sāpekṣaṃ paratantre ca pāśavaṃ mānam ucyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1512: īśvaraprerito yātīty ata eva munir jagau
GSP30abhmal1u:1516: vyavahāre 'sti mānatvam anumā tu kathaṃ pramā
GSP30abhmal1u:1525: māyeva ca paśūnāṃ syān mānaṃ māyācidātakam // 1.783 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1528: prabhaviṣṇuḥ sa eveti kim anyair mānaḍambaraiḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1529: pramātā śiva evaiko yasyedaṃ svāṅgam īdrśam // 1.785 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1534: vindāna eva labhate nātra rūḍhiṃ kathaṃ cana
GSP30abhmal1u:1535: tad evaṃ tarkataḥ sarvo vyavahāra iti sthitam // 1.788 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1536: aśuddha saiva vidyeyam iti mānaṃ vidhīyatām
GSP30abhmal1u:1537: aśuddhir iyatī tasyā yad vastv ananusāritā // 1.789 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1538: anye tv anarthino nāsti pravṛttir iti niścitāḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1539: arthitvam eva sacivam ity evaṃ paryacūcudan // 1.790 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1541: anye tv āhuḥ saṃśayo 'pi na nāmāniścite gaje // 1.791 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1542: śaktatve sati jāyeta rāgo vāpi pravṛttaye
GSP30abhmal1u:1543: tataḥ svāṃ kartṛtām īṣad ālocya janatāḥ sadā // 1.792 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1544: pravartanta itītthaṃ syāt kalāyā eva jṛmbhitam
GSP30abhmal1u:1545: tenārthaḥ sa tathā vāstu mā vābhūt svātmanas tayā // 1.793 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1547: anye tv āhur anādir yo vyavahāraḥ kriyātmakaḥ // 1.794 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1553: annaṃ kṣudhaṃ śamayate tṛṣaṃ vārīti bālakāḥ // 1.797 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1557: tathā ca munir āhedaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpam iti dvaye // 1.799 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1561: kiṃ tu prasiddhir evāsau sā ca śabdasvarūpiṇī // 1.801 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1562: yā sarvadarśaneṣv eva na jātv āyāty apohyatām
GSP30abhmal1u:1563: chāgaiś caityo jaṭā bhasma bhikṣā daṇḍaḥ kamaṇḍaluḥ // 1.802 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1568: ittham āgama evāyaṃ pramāṇam iti dhīdhanaiḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:1569: uktaṃ satyaiva vāg aiśī prasiddhir avigānataḥ // 1.805 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1571: vidyāyām apy avidyāyāṃ pramāṇam iti tat sthitam // 1.806 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1573: anye tv āhur viśeṣo 'yaṃ kālo nāmābhivartate // 1.807 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1576: bhūtaḥ kāraṇakḷptyā tu bhāvy asau parikalpyate
GSP30abhmal1u:1577: sa cāyaṃ na svatantro 'sti kaś cid anyonyasaṃśrayāt // 1.809 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1590: cinnātha eva devo 'sau kālam ābhāsayaty alam // 1.815 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1594: idaṃ na yad ahaṃ cāhaṃ yan nedam idam apy adaḥ // 1.817 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1595: yan nedam iti citreyam abhāva[ābhāsa]syaiva mānatā
GSP30abhmal1u:1596: parā pramātṛtā yāsau śuddhā tasyāṃ pṛthaksthiti // 1.818 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1597: na mānam astīty atrāṃśe kiṃ tayā praviviktayā
GSP30abhmal1u:1598: yas tu sāṃsāriko mātṛbhāvaḥ sarvo 'yam īdṛśaḥ // 1.819 //
GSP30abhmal1u:1601: kva mātā kva ca vā mānaṃ kva ca meyo 'vatiṣṭhatām

GSP30abhmal1u:2212: bandho mokṣaḥ sukhaṃ svargo duḥkhaṃ jaḍamayī sthitiḥ // 1.1112 //
GSP30abhmal1u:2218: mūrto bhinnaḥ samāhūto hitvā bhogān nijān kṣaṇāt // 1.1115 //
GSP30abhmal1u:2219: deva etīti vārtaiṣā vacaneṣv eva śobhate
GSP30abhmal1u:2221: ātmaiva hi tathābhūtas tathā bhāty eva bhedataḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:2222: evaṃ svabhāva evaiṣa saṃvido yaḥ sa eva tu // 1.1117 //
GSP30abhmal1u:2227: evaṃ yo veda tattvenety uktaṃ cānuttare naye
GSP30abhmal1u:2229: ātmaiva śiva evaikaḥ ko bandhaḥ kā ca muktatā
GSP30abhmal1u:2248: śuddhas tatas tad ata eva hi tattvajālaṃ
GSP30abhmal1u:2251: bhāty eva tena bahudhaiṣa kṛtaḥ kriyāyāḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:2264: tāny evoddiśya tat sarvaṃ pūraṇāya dharāditaḥ // 1.1133 //
GSP30abhmal1u:2267: sphuritam asti na yat kila satyataḥ
GSP30abhmal1u:2271: tan nirṇītam anuttaraṃ śivapadaṃ saṃprāptikāmān prati
GSP30abhmal1u:2272: etat sarvam ihoditaṃ ca jagadānande vipakṣātmakaṃ
GSP30abhmal1u:2273: bhedaprāṇatayā yato 'tra nikhilo 'py eṣa prapañcaḥ sthitaḥ // 1.1135 //
